10101100100000010000000000000000	//mem[UART] <- "H"
00000000000000010000101000000010	//r1 >> 8
00100000101001010000000000000000	//r5 = 0
00100000101001010000000000000001	//r5++
00011111111111100000000000000000    //jump to 0 if r5 = r4
00010100101001000000000000000011	//jump to 3 if r5 != r4
11111100000000000000000000000000	//HLT
